Address.Address1: Chemin de Montrevers 1-3, Porte de Morat

Description.Text: The ivy-covered facades of Hotel Aux Remparts look out onto Fribourgs historic "Porte de Morat". Upon entering the hotel you are welcomed into an intimate "Art Dco" interior design carried through the smallest detail. You will appreciate this cosy and elegant hotel during your next stay or seminar in Fribourg.

Standard Room - Our "Standard" rooms offer either a Queen bed (160 cm) or twin beds and are equipped with flat screen TV, free Wi-Fi, a welcome tray for making tea or coffee, a safe, mini-bar, hair dryer and 4 Star features.
Deluxe Room - Our "deluxe" rooms look onto the Remparts of Fribourg. They offer either a Queen bed (160 cm) or twin beds and are equipped with TV flat screen, free Wi-Fi, a welcome tray for making tea or coffee , a safe, mini-bar, hair dryer and 4 Star features.
Junior Suites - Our "Junior Suites" are designed for the most comfortable stay with a spacious area for relaxing. They offer twin beds and are equipped with TV flat screen, free Wi-Fi, a welcome tray for making tea or coffee, a safe, mini-bar, hair dryer and 4 Star features.
Business Room - Our "Business Rooms" are designed for facilitating your work time at the hotel. They offer either a Queen bed (160 cm) or twin beds and are equipped with an office area suitable up to 4 persons, free Wi-Fi, TV flat screen, a welcome tray for making tea or coffee, a Lap top safe, a mini-bar, hair dryer and 4 Star features.
